main.name: Alfred A Tabaco
main.description: I have 8+ years of strong hands-on experience in web/cloud technologies. I have strong experience with full stack development including understanding UI frameworks and backend architecture interactions
main.bio: I am a senior Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of hands-on experience. I have been working as a freelancer since 2010 and I have been concentrating on building marketplace, e-commerce, real estate, rental, booking sites for the last five years and developed a lot of sites using individual frameworks like React, Angular, Vue, Node and Ruby on Rails, Python/Django and PHP frameworks
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Ruby on Rails Certification Training Course

work.title: Remote Ruby on Rails / React Developer
work.description: Worked as a remote RoR/React Developer and developed front-end user interface using React and back-end apis using RoR

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Full Stack Java | Spring Developer at Austin Code Academy. Passionate about finding and cultivating resources to ensure students are successful. Passionate about data. Interested in making full stack web apps that embody good design principles. Come talk to me, let's build good things

work.title: Senior React Developer
work.description: Helped its internal development team build NZTA (New Zealand TransportAgency) Fatigue Admin Dashboard using React.js, Apollo/React-hooks and Ruby on Rails.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Freelancer since 2010, 8+ years of experience with web+mobile development and team management. Specializing in React, React Native, Redux, Node, Angular, TypeScript, Ruby on Rails, WebGL, Three.js, GraphQL, AWS, and everything else Javascript.

testimonials.text: Alfred is wonderful to work with. He is consistent, available, and reliable. He delivers quality work and meets the requirements of the job, but even more than that, he thinks through what I or the end-user will need a proposes adjustments to the requirements in order to make a better product. I am excited to continue working with him.

Jason has worked with me as a full-stack developer/data analyst for several product launches for the past three months. I’m amazed by Jason’s ability to make long-term partners with anyone, a skill he uses to full effect when presenting/building new applications to the clients.
